subject: Re: Small tweak to Pmc2c.pm
body:
Bob Rogers wrote:
>    This reports unknown method names when generating C code for PMCs.
> WDOT?  Is this the right place for it?  Should it die instead of warn?
> 
> 					-- Bob Rogers

Can you put it in an email with a subject line beginning [PATCH] and 
send it to parrotbug@parrotcode.org?  That's the entry point to our RT 
system (per docs/submissions.pod).

kid51
